data.name: GALAXY TOP WING
data.detailed_description: This is an independent development of casual games, is the experience of virtual reality space shooting game. The player flying in the universe and sitting in the cockpit and observing the magnificent cosmic scenes outside the  fighter by the VR, through the meteorite zones, the jumping doors, the debris of the spacecraft and other scenes, chasing and shooting with the enemy fighters in space with their teammates and attacking the enemy's spaceship. Follow up plans also develop planetary exploration, Galaxy roaming, and spaceship wars. Control the direction of the fighter through the mouse in the game,' W' key to speed forward, 'S' key to slow down, 'A' key to the left roll, 'D' key roll to the right, 'ESC' key suspension game, 'space' key resume game, the left mouse button shooting, the right mouse button to change the weapon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7 64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated digital hd audio device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10 64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GRX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated digital hd audio device
